FARMER CONTRACT AGREEMENT

This agreement is made between {{doc.company}} having registered office address at {% if a %}{{a}}{% endif %}, {% if b %}{{b}}{% endif %}, {% if c %}{{c}}{% endif %}, {% if d %}{{d}}{% endif %}, {% if e %}{{e}}{% endif %}. herein after referred to as ‘the Company’ which expressions shall where the context so admit include successors in-title, representatives and assigns of the one part, and {{doc.first_name}} {% if doc.last_name %}{{doc.last_name}} {% endif %} of {% if doc.address %} {{doc.address}} {% endif %}. Herein after referred to as ‘the Farmer’ which expressions shall where the context so admits include successors, representatives and assigns of the other part.

IT IS HEREBY AGREED AS FOLLOWS:
  1. That the Farmer has registered on Organic Farming scheme of the Company as a member with membership No : {{doc.membership_no}}
  2. That the Farmer has fully understood the term ‘Organic Farming’ as it relates to the Company’s description and explanation of the term and the Farmer agreed to abide by it.
  3. That the Farmer accept the management of the Company. And that the Farmer shall take steps needed for Organic certification and shall co-operate in the inspections.
  4. That in the Farmer’s farm, the Farmer shall only engage in agriculture that follows Organic standards.
  5. That produce from any other land that is not part of the land the Farmer operating Organic certification, shall not be mixed up with Organic certified produce.
  6. That only with the permission of the Company the Farmer can sell the certified product(s) that is or are produced under the Organic Farming Scheme of the agreed Certified land to any other individuals/organizations or markets.
  7. That the Farmer agreed to only implement Organic agriculture techniques recommended by the Company. And that the Farmer will also participate in related organized training programmes.
  8. That If the Farmer deviate in any way from Organic agriculture techniques recommended by the Company in his land, the Farmer shall inform the appointed Internal Auditor or the Company.
  9. That the Farmer understand that if he/she do something that does not fall in line with the specifications after obtaining the Organic certification, the action shall adversely affect all the members in the group.
  10. That the Farmer shall allow the Company and the Certification Agency appointed by it to inspect documents related to the Farmer’s farm, warehouse and farm diary.
  11. That the information of the Farmer’s family and farm collected by the Company is with the Farmer’s knowledge and he/she agrees that it can be shared by the Company for developmental/improvement purposes.
  12. That only through mutual agreement the Farmer will give up his/her membership.
  13. That the Farmer will not permit child labour in his/her farm.
  14. That the Farmer shall as much as possible, engage his/her family members for labour on the farm.
  15. That If the Farmer shall ever have to employ contract labourers on the farm, equal wages should be paid irrespective of gender.
  16. That the Farmer will not use GMO products and products not allowed by Organic certification in the farm.
  17. That this contract shall be valid till the Farmer voluntarily give up his/her membership from the Company or till the Company cancels the Farmer’s membership.
